title: Update Facebook Open Graph tags
body: Images should have an aspect ratio of 1.91:1 and be a minimum of 1200 x 630. Verify with debugger: https://developers.facebook.com/tools/debug/

title: Update widget analytics with project name
Add project to team projects list
Update master sitemaps index and redeploy
Email media relations re: press releasees
Setup Hipchat service hook on github
Let the copy desk know an app is coming
Make sure the copy desk is happy
Let the homepage team know an app is coming
body: A week or so before launch give them a link, a walkthrough and discuss headlines and teasers

title: Send shell page to homepage editors
Distribute launch timeline
body: Let stakeholders, social media, etc know what the launch schedule is

title: Run the app through Google Page Speed
Change LICENSE to MIT if open sourcing
body: By default things are copyright NPR

title: Update Google Analytics topics variable with Seamus topic ids
body: `app_config.GOOGLE_ANALYTICS.topics` is necessary to be tracked in all reports. You can steal this value from the source of a related npr.org story

title: Update project meta description
body: It's in the copytext document. This gets indexed by Google.

title: Setup retrospective review with editor
body: What did we learn? How do we do better next time?

title: Verify page title tags are good
Duplicate the COPY spreadsheet
body: Make a copy for this project and update `app_config.COPY_GOOGLE_DOC_KEY` with new key: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AlXMOHKxzQVRdHZuX1UycXplRlBfLVB0UVNldHJYZmc&usp=drive_web#gid=0

title: Document custom Google Analytics events in README
Implement completion GA event
body: Could be implemented based on scroll depth, slide progress or something else

title: Make promotion plans with the social media team
Draft Facebook post for homepage team
